alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 7:42PM CDT until June 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CLEVELAND...WEST CENTRAL DESHA...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Star City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Star City... Gould... Grady... Nebo... Feenyville... Cottondale... Whitefield... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Mills... Woodville... Douglas... Little Bayou Meto Park... Garrett Bridge... Tarry... Gourd... Tamo... Tyro... Palmyra... Rose Hill... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
